  <description>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_99532</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_99532</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Lumière réfléchie par une plante en floraison</string>
            <string language="en">Light reflected by a flowering plant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht reflektierte sich durch eine blühende 
Pflanze</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A luz refletiu por uma planta flowering</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La luce ha riflesso da una pianta flowering</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φως που απεικονίζεται από ένα ανθίζοντας φυτό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La luz reflejó por una planta floreciente</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre une plante en floraison.  Ceci peut être employé pour prouver que les fleurs semblent  rouges parce qu'elles réfléchissent la lumière rouge tandis que les feuilles semblent vertes parce qu'elles réfléchissent de la lumière verte.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a flowering plant. This may be used to show that the flowers look red because they reflect red light while the leaves look green because they reflect green light.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">couleur</string>
            <string language="en">colour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plantes en floraison</string>
            <string language="en">flowering plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">fleurs</string>
            <string language="en">flowers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière verte</string>
            <string language="en">green light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">feuilles</string>
            <string language="en">leaves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière rouge</string>
            <string language="en">red light</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine blühende Pflanze. 
Dieses kann verwendet werden, um zu zeigen, daß die Blumen rot 
schauen, weil sie rotes Licht reflektieren, während die Blätter 
grün schauen, weil sie grünes Licht reflektieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma planta flowering. 
Isto pode ser usado mostrar que as flores olham vermelhas porque
refletem a luz vermelha quando as folhas olharem verdes porque 
refletem a luz verde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una pianta flowering.
Ciò può essere usata per indicare che i fiori sembrano rossi 
perché riflettono la luce rossa mentre i fogli sembrano verdi perché
riflettono la luce verde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ανθίζοντας φυτό. 
Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να δείξει ότι τα 
λουλούδια φαίνονται κόκκινα επειδή απεικονίζουν το κόκκινο φως 
ενώ τα φύλλα φαίνονται πράσινα επειδή απεικονίζουν το πράσινο 
φως.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una planta floreciente. 
Esto se puede utilizar para mostrar que las flores parecen rojas
porque reflejan la luz roja mientras que las hojas parecen verdes 
porque reflejan la luz verde.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farbe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">blühende Pflanzen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blumen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">grünes Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blätter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">helle Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">rotes Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">flores</string>
